PSXzide94ww.Name: 2024 South American Tour
PSXzide94ww.Description:
Prem Rawat in South America - 2024

March 10 - Buenos Aires, Argentina - 5:00 P.M. (ART) (8:00 P.M. UTC)
March 16 - Punta del Este, Uruguay - TBD
March 23 - Lima, Peru - 11:30 A.M. (Peru Time) (4:30 P.M. UTC)
March 30 - S√£o Paulo, Brazil - 5:00 P.M. (Brazil Time) (8:00 P.M. UTC)

In English with Simultaneous Translation in French | Hindi | Portuguese | Spanish
LiveStreams on TimelessToday¬Æ

‚ÄúThe objective in life is to be surrounded by those things that bring us closer to ourselves.‚Äù  Prem Rawat

After eight years since his last speaking engagement in South America, Prem Rawat will hold a series of events in March in multiple cities in Latin America, highlighting his practical approach to finding peace in a noisy world.

Prem has asked that the livestreams and replays from this tour be made available for free in Spanish and Portuguese on TimelessToday.tv. Although no account is needed, having a free basic account enables you to keep in touch and receive important news and updates from TimelessToday.

If you don‚Äôt already have the TimelessToday app, we recommend you install it and try it out before the tour begins.

Other Information:
- Livestreams in English, Hindi and French will be accessible with a Classic or Premier subscription. 
- Replays in Spanish, Portuguese, English, Hindi and French will be available within 72 hours to enjoy anytime. Other languages will be added when available.
- Replays in Spanish and Portuguese will be available free of charge for two weeks after the final event on the Latin American tour. Then, replays in these languages will be available with a TimelessToday subscription to enjoy anytime.
- Be sure to turn on Notifications in the Settings menu of your mobile device for the TimelessToday app.

For more information: https://live.timelesstoday.tv/utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=des

For information about attending these events in person, go to wopg.org. 
Stay tuned for more details.

Upij_h4dmJs.Name: The Human Equation: Author Event with Prem Rawat in Buenos Aires
Upij_h4dmJs.Description:
‚ÄúWhat is the difference between the sun and a flashlight?‚Äù Prem asked Delfina when she asked him to speak on the topic of finding real love in today‚Äôs complicated world.

The conversation took place between Prem Rawat, author of ‚ÄúHear Yourself,‚Äù and Delfina Galarza, journalist from La Nacion Buenos Aires. It began with being at ease as an individual who‚Äôs paying attention to their life, and evolved into profound views into the singular divine within each individual.

When Delfina asked Prem what would be the one key point he hopes readers get from his book, he replied: ‚ÄúInclude your heart in your life.‚Äù

This special event commenced with Prem Rawat receiving the Golden Diploma, a lifetime award as an Honored Guest of the City of Buenos Aires for his services to Peace.

WtGMRo1ooqY.Description:
"When you read something, your job is to extract. Extract. Extract the wisdom. Not take it hook, line and sinker, and go, ‚ÄúYes. Okay.‚Äù Your job is to extract and if you‚Äôre good at extracting, then you will become very wise." Prem Rawat

On the morning of the 11th of September, in Amaroo,  Prem delivered a truly compelling and penetrating message. So many life changing themes were shared including the continued theme of the drop, the river and the ocean. 

He reflected on the continuous cycle where we as a drop have a beginning that ends in the ocean only to start the journey again. He talked about this ‚Äúlittle now‚Äù (the drop) and how we should be conscious of two things, that which constantly changes and that which is constant.  The Amaroo 2024 experience continues.

Z8e2Lt0RCkQ.Name: The Rain in the Desert. Melbourne, Australia
Z8e2Lt0RCkQ.Description:
On September 21st, 2014, International Day of Peace, Prem Rawat spoke at the Town Hall in Melbourne, Australia. He pointed out that, while we have many options in our lives, peace is not one of the options. Peace, he says, is really a necessity for human beings, just as rain is a necessity for flowers to bloom in the desert.
Sunday 21 September 2014

Z9eN2Md3q6Q.Name: The Journey of Life
Z9eN2Md3q6Q.Description: Using the example of a boat sailing on the ocean, Prem Rawat addresses the nature of the world with its ups and downs, while talking about the preparations that a person can make to ensure that their own journey is a pleasant one. Humorous anecdotes also illustrate the ways a person could get in his or her own way. Beautiful watercolor images of seascapes complement the timelessness and serenity of the message.

ZX9wGL0RCTY.Name: WHAT IS LIFE?  - Tim Freke interviews Prem Rawat
ZX9wGL0RCTY.Description:
‚ÄúThere is an experience that touches the heart and it is validated not by ideas, but by the feeling.‚Äù ‚Äì Prem Rawat, ‚ÄúWhat is Life?‚Äù Interview

Tim‚Äôs interviews feature philosophical conversations made public. In this episode, Tim and Prem discuss knowing yourself and much more.

https://timfreke.com/
https://www.youtube.com/hashtag/timfreke

PREM RAWAT has lived an extraordinary life, starting as a young boy in the 70's addressing huge crowds in India and the West, to his commitment as global peace ambassador in more than 100 countries. He is the founder of The Peace Education Program, and the author of international bestsellers ‚ÄúPeace Is Possible‚Äù and ‚ÄúHear Yourself.‚Äù
https://www.premrawat.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=des
https://hearyourselfbook.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=des

Tim asks for Prem‚Äôs insight into Life. 

Tim: What is it? What should we do with it?

Prem Rawat: It's very straightforward. What is life? It's an opportunity. Some people think it's an opportunity to make money. Some people think it's an opportunity to have a family. Some people think it is an opportunity to do something, build the biggest bridge. All of that's okay. That can be done. But the biggest opportunity here is twofold. One, to know yourself ‚Äì who you are ‚Äì and two, to experience that power that permeates everything. Not know the power; experience the power.

#premrawatofficial #peace #timfreke

Zb-qn7s-2CI.Description:
Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) presents the message of peace of Prem Rawat and undertakes humanitarian activities to bring harmony in life. It organises live events with Prem Rawat and video events related to his message. His message is‚ÄîPeace is Possible for everyone and that peace is a fundamental need of every human being.
The organisation is dedicated to helping people explore human potential, the joy of being alive and experiencing peace. RVK in its endeavour to improve the quality of human life offers many humanitarian services, including Free Eye Clinics and Food for People in remote areas. It also supports other organisations having similar charitable, social and philanthropic goals.

Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) shares and supports the vision that peace is possible in everybody‚Äôs life. This can happen only when each individual takes personal responsibility and discovers personal peace within. Its activities are supported by voluntary contributions of individuals who appreciate this message. 

Helping You Discover Personal Peace Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) invites Prem Rawat to address people interested in his message of Self-discovery and Self-knowledge. His addresses are very much appreciated and over 50 million people have benefited from them. The number of attendees often exceeds 300,000 at events addressed by Prem Rawat. Prem Rawat presents and offers a practical way to focus within to enjoy the experience of peace inside. Peace Education Programme - From Darkness Into Light. Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) also organises events regularly in jails across the country. His message has helped many prisoners to revert back to the normal life of a law-abiding citizen.
Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) is a non-¬≠profit registered charitable organization

_HFtVwI2Gus.Description:
Enjoy this Prem Rawat video on personal growth and how to find peace inside.

Most of us have no idea what peace is. Peace is not about problems, the good and bad, and being confused about life. It is a part of your nature. 

"There is a place in you where that light is, where that joy is, where that clarity is, where that understanding is. And experiencing that place will bring you peace. That‚Äôs what peace is." Prem Rawat

Sahitya Tak - Welcome to the rich world of Hindi Literature. a407d6ba-f14b-4e8c-8190-17e7f7138826.Name: Session 9, Amaroo 2025
a407d6ba-f14b-4e8c-8190-17e7f7138826.Description:
5-Day conference with Prem Rawat in Amaroo, Australia The bushland weather was dynamic, as it delivered all four seasons in just hours during the five-day conference at the Amaroo amphitheatre. As the start of this final Amaroo 2025 session arrived, Prem Rawat posed a compelling question to his audience: Will this conference make a difference in your lives going forward? He offered practical wisdom for navigating daily stress: identify what truly makes you happy and do more of it. He then shifted to a breathtaking perspective, noting that our Milky Way galaxy spans 100,000 to 200,000 light years across ‚Äî with one light year equaling 5.88 trillion miles. "I don't know what 100 billion stars look like," he reflected, based on current estimates, "but I know that I have peace in my heart." ‚ÄúI wanted knowledge. I wasn't interested in you [Prem]. I just wanted your knowledge. Then I found that I needed your help for me to understand, and a love for you has grown. I'm infinitely grateful.‚Äù Amaroo 2025 Participant

Watch anytime with your Classic or Premier subscription.

‚ÄúMy father had a vision. And his vision was ‚ÄòSomeday, my youngest son will take this Knowledge to the whole world.‚Äô This was his vision ... He saw he couldn‚Äôt do it ‚Ä¶ but he planted a seed. And today it‚Äôs happening.‚Äù  Prem Rawat

a7fca2fd-4259-46c7-8332-73a7f15c6085.Description:
Livestream Replay of Prem Rawat in Mirzapur, India | English


Prem Rawat‚Äôs achievements of launching the Hindi version of his bestseller, ‚ÄúHear Yourself,‚Äù and becoming a Guinness World Records holder for the largest audience during a single author‚Äôs reading, were again celebrated during this April 9, 2023 event in Mirzapur, India.

Author and masterful storyteller, Prem Rawat shared his wisdom and addressed the importance of understanding an unspoken story that touches the heart and impacts a lifetime with joy that, as he says, is easily attainable. His relentless commitment to bringing this message to people from all walks of life around the world continues on.

The event included an insightful behind-the-scenes video from the Author Event in Lucknow.

The replay of this event, as well as Prem Rawat‚Äôs insights into how simple it is to be happy, even in the face of great sorrow and sadness, is now available to Classic and Premier subscribers.

a9d418dd-35ef-41ad-b308-7120f348e4c3.Name: Session 5, Focus 5
a9d418dd-35ef-41ad-b308-7120f348e4c3.Description:
Amaroo 2022 with Prem Rawat


Focus 5 in Amaroo continued in this amazing setting with another opportunity to hear Prem Rawat remind us of the life choices that are in our control.  He explained how pain can come in many forms including emotional, physical and the expectations we set for ourselves. He encouraged everyone, reminding us that ‚Äúgiving up‚Äù is the worst thing you can do.

Prem continued with the message that there is always hope and by having the courage you will be on the journey to knowing yourself.  It is our outlook and our understanding that is at the core of overcoming obstacles.  We need to make the choice to ‚Äúwater the plants and not the weeds and there will be a good yield.‚Äù A gardener learns, over time, the difference between the two.

Prem also warns us that the world promises you everything but gives you nothing, while inner wisdom, even though promising nothing gives you everything.  With gratitude for this life, we can celebrate in the midst of any darkness.

July 31, 2022, marks the 56th year that Prem Rawat has spent sharing a simple, clear, practical vision of Self-Knowledge. 

To celebrate this special occasion and the unique relationship between the teacher and student on life‚Äôs journey, Prem Rawat has recorded a special message.

There has never been a better time like now for living consciously. 

Enjoy free access to this special message from Prem Rawat in Hindi with English translation on the TimelessToday app, website, and on the Prem Rawat Official YouTube channel any time.

aee9a2b2-575e-4f7a-bf4d-f303da8fdba3.Name: Forgiveness
aee9a2b2-575e-4f7a-bf4d-f303da8fdba3.Description:
Prem Rawat in Soweto, South Africa


It all began with Ernest Leketi, a youth development officer of Johannesburg, who proposed Prem‚Äôs Peace Education Program (PEP) to the city council. They saw the value of the program and endorsed it. From a nucleus of seven enthusiastic people, interest in peace education soon spread to 50 people. By the time of Prem‚Äôs first visit to Soweto on November 25, 2014, there was interest from 350. The exciting event, celebrated with music and dance, attracted media attention.

Prem met backstage with the seven PEP facilitators. Each of them expressed appreciation for the benefits they experienced listening to Prem‚Äôs talks. His interaction with them was galvanizing and inspired their commitment to continue moving his message forward.

In 2015, Prem accepted an invitation to speak to an audience of 1200 in Soweto. Urging them to keep advancing despite their challenges, he told them that whatever has been created by human beings can be changed. Prem talked about the powerful attributes within everyone and offered his unique perspective on how they work.

‚Äì Written by Francisca Matos

af0f87a8-0336-4610-8b60-c93c2b75cf6f.Name: Lockdown with Prem Rawat - Day 50

b6b12abf-03a7-4e0c-8704-c001c94fe9f8.Description:
Hans Jayanti LiveStream REPLAY


Throughout history, there have been teachers who have shown people how to uncover the peace within them. November 8th marked the 118th birth anniversary of one such beloved teacher, Shri Hans Ji Maharaj, who was also Prem Rawat‚Äôs father, in a celebration known as Hans Jayanti.

Catch the Replay of this extraordinary celebration of the tradition connecting Shri Hans Ji Maharaj and Prem‚Äîand teachers and students for generations‚Äîin the experience of personal peace.

b714aab7-ed8c-425f-90ca-a83c72691602.Name: Finding Peace... In You (Trailer)
b714aab7-ed8c-425f-90ca-a83c72691602.Description:
Prem Rawat in Medellin, Colombia


After 52 years of war and conflict in Colombia, relief came in 2016 as both sides agreed to a peace treaty, initiating a series of reconciliation efforts and a chance to rebuild. With the inclusion of the Peace Education Program, Prem‚Äôs message is now reaching hearts across the country‚Äîbringing hope for a new era of peace, transformation and understanding.

While in Medellin, Prem discusses the perspective of good and bad, shares the simple answer to finding peace, and talks about the value of what lies within each of us.


Available in the Events section of the TimelessToday app and website.

b7ecbdb8-6425-4503-9c18-18ce0d34c73a.Name: 50th Anniversary Day 1
b7ecbdb8-6425-4503-9c18-18ce0d34c73a.Description:
2016 Amaroo, Australia


For the past 50 years, Prem Rawat has been focused on one simple goal ‚Äì to communicate his message of peace to as many people as possible.  His efforts have been relentless and the results have been extraordinary ‚Äì but never as extraordinary as this past year. Indeed, in 2016, Prem reached more people than ever before.

In September 2016, 4,500 of these people attended a five-day event with Prem at the Ivory‚Äôs Rock Conference and Event Center (aka Amaroo) in Australia. By all accounts, the event was a most remarkable one.

Today, in honor of the holiday season and the many requests we‚Äôve received, we are happy to announce the launch of an online 50th Anniversary Gift Set.  This comprehensive collection includes nine of Prem‚Äôs addresses from the 5-day celebration with material not seen before on TimelessToday.  It also features many of the extraordinary stories he told in Amaroo from the Mahabharata ‚Äì a classic Indian epic infused with enduring principles still relevant today.

Written by Mitch Ditkoff

b8183a02-8a16-48e8-942d-30e0a5c8da20.Name: Prem Rawat's Peace Education and Knowledge (PEAK)
b8183a02-8a16-48e8-942d-30e0a5c8da20.Description:
As human history has evolved, there was a point where people began to realize there‚Äôs a level of consciousness beyond day-to-day thinking. What has been missing for most of us is an awareness of a practical, heartfelt way to go beyond our limitations, assumptions, and habits. One might say it is our life‚Äôs purpose to know and experience peace and gratitude.

Prem Rawat‚Äôs Peace Education and Knowledge (PEAK) program engages you in his practical approach, free for all interested in exploring a journey to personal peace. TimelessToday, Prem‚Äôs media company, is proud to deliver the PEAK mobile app. Packed with videos and designed to be self-paced, PEAK is available at no charge on the TimelessToday app from the Apple AppStore or Google Play Store.


You can also find plenty of free content on the TimelessToday app and website, including audios and videos of Prem addressing live audiences. In addition, a TimelessToday subscription provides access to Prem Rawat‚Äôs livestream events and other premium content.

His insights encouraged listeners to move past the worries and struggles of daily life to something profound ‚Äî the simple act of breathing and the life story it sustains.

"When you wake up in the morning, give yourself a boon to remember this breath, to remember the kindness that's inside of you, to give yourself a boon of joy." Prem Rawat

bba6f17b-8362-4126-af0d-69e06f49d478.Name: 125th Hans Jayanti Celebration
bba6f17b-8362-4126-af0d-69e06f49d478.Description:
Session 2: Prem Rawat in Delhi At the second session of the 125th Hans Jayanti celebration in Delhi, Prem Rawat explored the crucial difference between imagination and reality, with his message reaching 15,000 online viewers worldwide via TimelessToday. Using the tragic 2025 Air India crash as an example, he explained that people tend to live in imagination but are unprepared when reality strikes. He distinguished between imagined peace that the world chases and true peace that comes from knowing the divine within. Prem Rawat emphasized that reaching the divine essence within - which even the greatest spiritual masters meditate upon - is actually easy, not difficult. What's needed is a true teacher who provides knowledge and practical guidance until one‚Äôs last breath, not speeches. He described two prisons: one with physical bars and the prison of ignorance. True freedom comes from experiencing the divine within one's heart. This is the time to experience joy and to fulfill one‚Äôs life with love, knowledge and bliss.

125th Hans Jayanti Celebration with Prem Rawat in Delhi • 81 min. Enjoy any time on the TimelessToday app/website

bbd71b45-1dfb-4c79-aec6-a0a68f6bfdce.Name: 125th Hans Jayanti Celebration
bbd71b45-1dfb-4c79-aec6-a0a68f6bfdce.Description:
Session 3: Prem Rawat in Delhi In the third session of the 125th Hans Jayanti celebration, Prem Rawat inspired the audience toward life's true purpose. He explored three essentials of personal transformation: service, genuine listening and the daily practice of Self-Knowledge. He emphasized that authentic service comes from a direct relationship with one's teacher, not institutional duty, and that true listening means letting a message reach the heart ‚Äî not just collecting words. Addressing our tendency to make excuses, he noted how people claim they're too busy to practice the techniques of Self-Knowledge taught by Prem Rawat, yet somehow find time when self-interest is involved. He concluded powerfully: "The day you stop making excuses ‚Äî with the world, with yourself ‚Äî to not practice this Knowledge, and start making excuses to practice Knowledge, that day everything will change for you." In a captivating fusion of tradition and innovation, Prem Rawat unveiled his musical compositions ‚Äî Indian devotional songs reimagined through cutting-edge technology. The third session electrified over 15,000 viewers on the TimelessToday app and those gathered in person, with these timeless melodies transformed into stunning new arrangements that bridged centuries of spiritual heritage with modern sound.

125th Hans Jayanti Celebration with Prem Rawat in Delhi • 56 min. Enjoy any time on the TimelessToday app/website

c324171a-8eca-4ade-b750-fe2c296af43a.Name: The Season of Peace
c324171a-8eca-4ade-b750-fe2c296af43a.Description:
An excerpt:

People say, ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs so much greed in this world.‚Äù Yes, there is! But why is there greed? Why is there greed? You think human beings are only capable of greed? No, human beings are also capable of generosity.

I just want the wind to blow so you can fly the kite. I want the river to run. I want the well to be full of water, so you can be in the glory of a human being‚Äîthe glory of a human being. The flower that blooms, blooms! Petals open, colors vibrant, beauty unmatched, fragrance, hypnotizing. Bloom! That‚Äôs what needs to happen!

Know! Know that the peace dwells in your heart, not because I said it, but because you felt it. That‚Äôs knowing. Know that that Divine dwells in your heart, not because I said it‚Äîbecause you felt it, not one day, not two days, not three days, but all your life. This is the realm. There is no time‚Äîthere is no ‚Äúyoung‚Äù; there is no ‚Äúold.‚Äù It is the same for everyone.

When spring comes, it comes the same for everyone‚Äîlike a baby, a hundred-year-old, a fifty-year-old, forty, thirty, twenty. It comes for everyone in the same way. When the summer comes, it is the same way. When it is fall, it is the same way. When it is the winter, it is the same way.

Let the season of peace come in your life. The time has come. The time has come; let the season of peace come in your life.

- Prem Rawat

Following a typhoon that hit Lucknow, India only days before Prem Rawat‚Äôs Author Event on April 2, 2023, over 114,000 people gathered for the launch of the Hindi version of his book, ‚ÄúHear Yourself.‚Äù An additional virtual audience of 8,923 logged in from 86 countries, and Anjan TV also shared the celebration.

The author‚Äôs heartfelt words, based on decades of experience, emphasized the importance of finding one‚Äôs own joy and peace within, no matter the situation, and how this is humankind‚Äôs greatest possible achievement.

Surprising the audience at the end of the event, an adjudicator from Guinness World Records came on stage and announced that Prem Rawat had smashed the 2018 prior record for the largest audience attending a single author‚Äôs reading. Congratulations, Prem Rawat!

cb5e4b8e-1a31-4db8-82b5-214f1eaaf3eb.Description:
Prem Rawat in Ljubljana, Slovenia Prem Rawat‚Äôs inspiring book ‚ÄúBreath: Wake Up to Life,‚Äù newly released in Slovenian, Croatian, Bosnian and Serbian, was the backdrop to a captivating event with the author in Ljubljana, Slovenia on July 9th. Prem delivered his profound, simple and clear message for audiences across the Balkans. The evening began with the lights dimmed and MC and storyteller Mrs. Tja≈°a Koprivec Vuga setting the stage for Prem's powerful address. During his talk, Prem emphasized that knowing and practicing life has nothing to do with our jobs, relationships or daily responsibilities. "The world that's inside is similar but different," he told the audience. "It‚Äôs where peace can happen. It doesn‚Äôt happen in the outside world." The author touched on how even the United Nations' definition of peace never once takes into account what all humanity in every nation has in common ‚Äì this breath. Rather than offering abstract definitions, Prem focused on encouraging people to actually feel peace and discover that clarity for themselves

“Practice Life” • Prem Rawat in Ljubljana, Slovenia • 62 min. Enjoy any time on the TimelessToday app/website

cde6760b-b22d-44c0-a460-b7ca4b5a0ea8.Name: Amaroo 2018! (Trailer)
cde6760b-b22d-44c0-a460-b7ca4b5a0ea8.Description:
5-Day conference, Queensland, Australia.


Last September for five full days, thousands of people from every corner of the globe came together with Prem on a pristine patch of land in Queensland, Australia to unplug, unwind‚Äîand make the most of a unique opportunity to focus on the essentials of living a fulfilled life.

Immerse yourself as Prem shares his keen perspective on everything from the epic stories of the Mahabharata to love and relationships in our times. There are personal exchanges with audience members that surface practical life hacks and piercing insights‚Ä¶and far-ranging talks that shed new light on the life we‚Äôve been given‚Ä¶all infused with Prem‚Äôs candor, warmth and humor.


Amaroo 2018 consists of 9 episodes and will be released one episode at a time every week for nine weeks, starting March 9th. 

Don't have the access needed to watch or listen to all 9 episodes? Find more information on https://www.timelesstoday.tv/amaroo2018/

Prem continued to provide the opportunity for individuals to express their love and tell a little bit about their journey in preparing to reach Australia.

In some of the examples, health, death and various challenges were shared and Prem passionately listened and responded.  He reminded everyone of his philosophy saying ‚ÄúThere is only a little control you have whilst you‚Äôre alive. So, find the Divine, hug the Divine, and hang onto the Divine.‚Äù  

As the evening wrapped up, he encouraged everyone to remember the lessons learnt, stay healthy and more events will be forthcoming.

d6ef89d2-82c0-4c8b-8967-a3b334b8111b.Name: 125th Hans Jayanti Celebration
d6ef89d2-82c0-4c8b-8967-a3b334b8111b.Description:
Session 1: Prem Rawat in Delhi At the 125th Hans Jayanti celebration in Delhi, Prem Rawat addressed approximately 50,000 attendees, offering profound insights on the essence of life and the importance of self-knowledge. Using a simple yet powerful analogy, he explained that just as reading a cookbook doesn't satisfy hunger, merely reading religious scriptures doesn't bring spiritual fulfillment. Real experience is necessary. He emphasized that human life is a priceless opportunity that won't come again, and must be taken full advantage of. Prem Rawat stressed the invaluable nature of breath, saying it is so precious that all the wealth on earth cannot pay for even one breath. Explaining the importance of a teacher, he said that giving knowledge is the master‚Äôs responsibility, but practicing it is the student's. He called for making life successful through listening and the practice of self-knowledge. Challenging the audience to recognize what they truly possess within themselves, he used the metaphor that everyone has a "bundle of jewels" but hasn't opened it to see what's inside. He stressed that this lifetime is singular - not two, three or four ¬†‚Äî and when the day of departure comes, no relatives, siblings or friends will accompany anyone. Therefore, one must know oneself, recognize this life and make it successful.

125th Hans Jayanti Celebration with Prem Rawat in Delhi • 63 min. Enjoy any time on the TimelessToday app/website

d735f4ec-5ddf-47ed-93bb-e53035ce1eb6.Name: Fernando Trezza interviews Prem Rawat (Part 1)
d735f4ec-5ddf-47ed-93bb-e53035ce1eb6.Description:
Part 1: Brazilian Association of Community Channels, Sao Paulo, Brazil


In Sao Paulo, Brazil, the Words of Peace television series had been airing for over ten years reaching over 10 million homes in the city of Sao Paulo and over 40 million homes in all of Brazil. To celebrate this milestone in 2013, Fernando Mauro Trezza, President of the Brazilian Association of Community Channels, sat down with Prem Rawat to ask him about his work, his message and why peace matters.

Fernando Mauro Trezza: "For many people today, peace seems to be a boring subject. Can this perspective be changed?" 

Prem Rawat: "Of course, because they're coming from a concept of what peace is. They're not coming from the need. They have to feel the need."

d7b93d18-b274-40b8-8f68-f6c5129f1ba3.Description:
5-Day conference with Prem Rawat in Amaroo, Australia More than 2.000 people gathered once again in Amaroo for this year‚Äôs 5-day retreat and focused on what the heart needs to soar. The opening session with Prem Rawat did just that: with his wit, wisdom and recently written and produced music tracks (shared only with Amaroo attendees at this time), he encouraged everyone to apply what they learn in Amaroo to their everyday life. The peace educator and renowned storyteller shared the American Psychological Association's definition of 'joy' - a deep sense of well-being that differs from happiness, can persist through difficult times and often remains invisible to others.

d83718b2-6a4c-4ac7-ae9a-a3e6575cc944.Name: Discover Your Forever

Prem Rawat in Miami-Hollywood, FL From start to finish, Prem Rawat's public event offered compelling wisdom that nourishes the heart and quiets the mind. "I'm not trying to be mystical," he explained. "If you feel that your breath is mystical, you missed the point completely." Instead, he invited the audience to recognize the magnificent gift of being alive right now ‚Äî to discover the infinite within the most obvious, down-to-earth miracle: the breath that sustains you. A powerful reminder that what we seek isn't distant or complex, but a beautiful simple feeling that is always present.

• Prem Rawat in Miami-Hollywood, FL • 63 min. Enjoy any time on the TimelessToday app/website.

da71487e-41b2-4d77-8fbb-cb12c4e9cc70.Name: Session 4: 124th Hans Jayanti Celebration
da71487e-41b2-4d77-8fbb-cb12c4e9cc70.Description:
Replay of livestream with Prem Rawat in Delhi, India. In his closing address at the 124th Hans Jayanti Celebration in Delhi, Prem Rawat shared heartfelt memories from his youth, recalling moments spent with his father and revered teacher, Shri Hans Ji Maharaj. These memories served as a reminder of the values and legacy that have shaped his journey and relentless effort to reach more and more people with his message of peace. Prem emphasized once again, the need to transform society to ensure that women are respected and granted the dignity they deserve. He highlighted the stark reality of a world where systems often profit from human suffering ‚Äî wars generate profit, the healthcare industry can thrive on illness, and technology is frequently used to distract rather than uplift. Amid these concerns, he urged individuals to be conscious, make wise choices, and avoid falling prey to societal traps. Concluding his address, he inspired the audience to ‚Äútake his words from their ears to their heart,‚Äù urging them to let it resonate within their hearts. This, he shared, requires a thirst for understanding and clarity of purpose.

With your  TimelessToday subscription  — Premier (video) or Classic (audio) — you have full access to all of Prem Rawat’s premium content, including livestreams, replays, popular series and multilingual content.

dff4e06e-0155-4f0f-b03d-c80e07df384b.Name: Feel Your Thirst
dff4e06e-0155-4f0f-b03d-c80e07df384b.Description:
Prem Rawat in Colombo, Sri Lanka On October 18, 2025, Prem Rawat returned to Sri Lanka after seven years to address a fundamental human need: peace. Speaking to an audience in Colombo, he challenged the idea that the divine exists somewhere outside of us, pointing instead to what's already present: the breath, which he called a blessing and a reminder of life itself. He encouraged the audience to feel their thirst for peace, joy and clarity first and then to recognize that true contentment comes from turning within and experiencing the self.

“Feel Your Thirst” • Prem Rawat in Colombo, Sri Lanka • 64 min. Replay • Tap/click the “cc” icon to activate in the app/website.

While in Sri Lanka, Prem sheds light on peace: What is it? Where does it come from? How is it possible? Do you recognize it‚Äôs already within you? e53fef6a-0517-4cc9-8527-0684717167c3.Name: Session 3, 50th Anniversary
e53fef6a-0517-4cc9-8527-0684717167c3.Description:
Amaroo 2016 Celebration series


For the past 50 years, Prem Rawat has been focused on one simple goal ‚Äì to communicate his message of peace to as many people as possible.  His efforts have been relentless and the results have been extraordinary ‚Äì but never as extraordinary as this past year. Indeed, in 2016, Prem reached more people than ever before.

In September 2016, 4,500 of these people attended a five-day event with Prem at the Ivory‚Äôs Rock Conference and Event Center (aka Amaroo) in Australia. By all accounts, the event was a most remarkable one.

Today, in honor of the holiday season and the many requests we‚Äôve received, we are happy to announce the launch of an online 50th Anniversary Gift Set.  This comprehensive collection includes nine of Prem‚Äôs addresses from the 5-day celebration with material not seen before on TimelessToday.  It also features many of the extraordinary stories he told in Amaroo from the Mahabharata ‚Äì a classic Indian epic infused with enduring principles still relevant today.
 
Written by Mitch Ditkoff

Prem Rawat in S√£o Paulo, Brazil | English The highly anticipated 2024 tour of South America culminated in an uplifting event in S√£o Paulo, Brazil on March 30, 2024. According to Prem Rawat, the promise of living a fulfilled life depends on accessing the heart. He urged attendees to live for today and to let go of the conflicts and pain from the past, while avoiding projecting them into the future. He reminded the audience that the promise of true fulfillment can‚Äôt be proven, but it can be experienced. ‚ÄúYou have to be ready to feel,‚Äù he said.

All livestreams and replays from the South American tour are free in Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese until April 15, 2024; then you can continue to enjoy them any time, as many times as you like with a TimelessToday® Classic or Premier subscription.

In September of 2016, over 4,500 people from around the world accepted Prem Rawat‚Äôs invitation to gather at Ivory‚Äôs Rock Conference Center in the Australian outback.

During this first morning session on September 20, 2016, Prem Rawat reminded the in-person attendees that this was not an ‚Äòevent,‚Äô but rather a celebration of 50 years of helping people thrive through self-discovery.

Prem Rawat has clearly worked tirelessly to preserve the sanctity of what he teaches. Seeing the potential in people, he helps them realize it and experience it every day. This is why he does what he does.

He spoke to the innate thirst and need in every human being for clarity. He said, ‚ÄúIf you did not have this want for clarity in your life, you would self-destruct.‚Äù Profoundly, he reminded the audience that, in order to play the role of a human being, you need wisdom and clarity.

fYPnTC6ErSU.Description:
The highly anticipated 2024 tour of South America culminated in an uplifting event in S√£o Paulo, Brazil on March 30, 2024.

According to Prem Rawat, the promise of living a fulfilled life depends on accessing the heart. He urged attendees to live for today and to let go of the conflicts and pain from the past, while avoiding projecting them into the future.

He reminded the audience that the promise of true fulfillment can‚Äôt be proven, but it can be experienced. ‚ÄúYou have to be ready to feel,‚Äù he said.

ff03b8a9-c69a-4538-b83d-05b728d01f77.Description:
5-Day conference with Prem Rawat in Ivorys Rock, Australia


On the afternoon of 11th of September, Prem asked Paul Bloomfield, who manages the Public Relations Office,  to provide the Amaroo attendees with a global perspective about the on-going efforts that he has inspired.

From Cuba to Soweto, Malaysia to Johns Hopkins University in Baltimore, Maryland, the story is compelling and to a significant degree understated.

Paul invited a range of speakers including TPRF team members, Dr.Raj Mukherjee, Neurosurgeon, the list goes on and on to share their experience. 

The afternoon concluded with Amy Bloomfield singing a heartfelt song for those in attendance.

g4XZpLXmbac.Description:
‚ÄúThis begins with you ‚Äì and ends with you. And that‚Äôs the greatest thing. If you can realize that, then that‚Äôs the greatest thing that‚Äôs ever happened ‚Äì to you! Not to other people, you! Just you!‚Äù Prem Rawat

Amaroo 2024 drew to a close on the evening of 13th of September.  Prem continued to provide the opportunity for individuals to express their love and tell a little bit about their journey in preparing to reach Australia. In some of the examples health, death and various challenges were shared and Prem passionately listened and responded.  

He reminded everyone of his philosophy saying ‚ÄúThere is  only a little control you have whilst you‚Äôre alive. So, find the Divine, hug the Divine, and hang onto the Divine.‚Äù  

As the evening wrapped he encouraged everyone to remember the lessons learnt, stay healthy and more events will be forthcoming.

gCugMRUODMI.Name: Yaad Rahega Ahsaan - ‡§Ø‡§æ‡§¶ ‡§∞‡§π‡•á‡§ó‡§æ ‡§Ö‡§π‡§∏‡§æ‡§®
gCugMRUODMI.Description:
Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) presents the message of peace of Prem Rawat and undertakes humanitarian activities to bring harmony in life. It organises live events with Prem Rawat and video events related to his message. His message is‚ÄîPeace is Possible for everyone and that peace is a fundamental need of every human being.
The organisation is dedicated to helping people explore human potential, the joy of being alive and experiencing peace. RVK in its endeavour to improve the quality of human life offers many humanitarian services, including Free Eye Clinics and Food for People in remote areas. It also supports other organisations having similar charitable, social and philanthropic goals.

Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) shares and supports the vision that peace is possible in everybody‚Äôs life. This can happen only when each individual takes personal responsibility and discovers personal peace within. Its activities are supported by voluntary contributions of individuals who appreciate this message. 

Helping You Discover Personal Peace Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) invites Prem Rawat to address people interested in his message of Self-discovery and Self-knowledge. His addresses are very much appreciated and over 50 million people have benefited from them. The number of attendees often exceeds 300,000 at events addressed by Prem Rawat. Prem Rawat presents and offers a practical way to focus within to enjoy the experience of peace inside. Peace Education Programme - From Darkness Into Light. Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) also organises events regularly in jails across the country. His message has helped many prisoners to revert back to the normal life of a law-abiding citizen.
Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) is a non-¬≠profit registered charitable organization

Prem Rawat, the book's author and renowned peace educator, answered questions and spoke passionately about the potential of self-awareness to create positive change.

jFinqJwymyA.Name: Livestream with Prem Rawat in Barcelona
jFinqJwymyA.Description:
Sunday, June 29, 2025 | 6:00 P.M. CEST (4:00 P.M. UTC)

Preparations are underway in Barcelona, Spain for Prem Rawat‚Äôs next 2025 speaking engagement. Over decades of sharing his message of personal peace, he has addressed audiences in Barcelona on at least 23 occasions. There‚Äôs never been a more important time to hear Prem‚Äôs message.

Last year in Barcelona, Prem offered a compelling analogy: life is like packing for a vacation. Just as you carefully select what to put in your suitcase to ensure an enjoyable trip, you must be thoughtful about what you carry with you throughout life. "Did you pack well?" he asked his audience, encouraging them to reflect on the choices that shape their journey.

In English with French, Hindi, Italian and Spanish translations

k845byCwFWg.Name: Prem Rawat | Hear Yourself: How to Find Peace in a Noisy World | Talks at Google
k845byCwFWg.Description:
Renowned teacher and author Prem Rawat discusses his book "Hear Yourself: How to Find Peace in a Noisy World", where he teaches us how to turn down the noise to ‚Äúhear ourselves‚Äù‚Äîto listen to the subtle song of peace that sings inside each of us. Once we learn to truly ‚Äúhear ourselves‚Äù and the voice of peace within, then we can hold on to that as we face all the noise of the world.

Prem Rawat is the founder of the Prem Rawat Foundation, where he works with people from all walks of life, showing them how to experience the source of peace within themselves. His work spans six decades of international effort to bring a practical message of hope, happiness, and peace to all, one person at a time. He is the internationally bestselling author of Peace Is Possible and is also a pilot, photographer, classic car restorer, father of four children and grandfather of four.

Get the book here: https://goo.gle/39nMZ0N.

For more information on Prem, please visit https://www.premrawat.com/.

Moderated by Prem Tiwari.

mWBuqpdj_fA.Name: Practice Life: Prem Rawat in Ljubljana
mWBuqpdj_fA.Description:
Prem Rawat‚Äôs inspiring book ‚ÄúBreath: Wake Up to Life,‚Äù newly released in Slovenian, Croatian, Bosnian and Serbian, was the backdrop to a captivating event with the author in Ljubljana, Slovenia on July 9th. Prem delivered his profound, simple and clear message for audiences across the Balkans.

"We‚Äôre not practicing life. We are practicing our ambitions: ‚ÄòI want to be this; I want to be that; I want to be cool,‚Äô when we should be practicing life." Prem Rawat 

The evening began with the lights dimmed and MC and storyteller Mrs. Tja≈°a Koprivec Vuga setting the stage for Prem's powerful address.
 
During his talk, Prem emphasized that knowing and practicing life has nothing to do with our jobs, relationships or daily responsibilities. "The world that's inside is similar but different," he told the audience. "It‚Äôs where peace can happen. It doesn‚Äôt happen in the outside world."
 
The author touched on how even the United Nations' definition of peace never once takes into account what all humanity in every nation has in common ‚Äì this breath. Rather than offering abstract definitions, Prem focused on encouraging people to actually feel peace and discover that clarity for themselves. 

The full video is available for TimelessToday Classic and Premier subscribers through the app and website. 
https://www.timelesstoday.tv/en/home/product/cb5e4b8e-1a31-4db8-82b5-214f1eaaf3eb/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=des

sQKhrEyNG20.Description:
Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) presents the message of peace of Prem Rawat and undertakes humanitarian activities to bring harmony in life. It organises live events with Prem Rawat and video events related to his message. His message is‚ÄîPeace is Possible for everyone and that peace is a fundamental need of every human being.
The organisation is dedicated to helping people explore human potential, the joy of being alive and experiencing peace. RVK in its endeavour to improve the quality of human life offers many humanitarian services, including Free Eye Clinics and Food for People in remote areas. It also supports other organisations having similar charitable, social and philanthropic goals.

Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) shares and supports the vision that peace is possible in everybody‚Äôs life. This can happen only when each individual takes personal responsibility and discovers personal peace within. Its activities are supported by voluntary contributions of individuals who appreciate this message. 

Helping You Discover Personal Peace Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) invites Prem Rawat to address people interested in his message of Self-discovery and Self-knowledge. His addresses are very much appreciated and over 50 million people have benefited from them. The number of attendees often exceeds 300,000 at events addressed by Prem Rawat. Prem Rawat presents and offers a practical way to focus within to enjoy the experience of peace inside. Peace Education Programme - From Darkness Into Light. Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) also organises events regularly in jails across the country. His message has helped many prisoners to revert back to the normal life of a law-abiding citizen.
Raj Vidya Kender (RVK) is a non-¬≠profit registered charitable organization

sgFwM9GbBF0.Name: Human Behind the Mask: Prem Rawat in Kyoto
sgFwM9GbBF0.Description:
On May 16, 2025, Prem Rawat celebrated his 100th event in Japan since 1972. He addressed the universal challenge of embracing life amid personal difficulties. And he emphasized the importance of recognizing our authentic selves beneath societal masks.

The event featured "EVOLUTION: A Decade of Effort and Growth," a 12-minute video showcasing innovative tools developed to share Prem Rawat's message of inner peace and Self-Knowledge across all demographics. The presentation highlighted his dedication to breaking barriers, empowering individuals, and providing vital humanitarian aid to vulnerable communities ‚Äì all in service of celebrating and fostering peace.

The replay of this event is now available in English for Classic and Premier subscribers to access on the app and website.
https://www.timelesstoday.tv/en/home/product/98bbebc8-061d-421c-8041-1ec83cdd75d1

sp9qw1smtdo.Description:
‚ÄúThis journey is the most beautiful journey that you have. You came. And every day of your life, a gift was given to you. You didn‚Äôt ask for it. You didn‚Äôt push a button for it. But in the abundance of the most precious thing there is on this planet earth, this gift was given to you.‚Äù
In this video, Prem Rawat speaks about being able to recognize the importance of life itself in the middle of the distractions we encounter every day, and emphasizes again that everything a human being needs is inside of them.
Sunday 22 June 2014. Madrid, Spain.

u7mSmWf5pS4.Description:
Following a typhoon that hit Lucknow, India only days before Prem Rawat‚Äôs Author Event on April 2, 2023, over 114,000 people gathered for the launch of the Hindi version of his book, ‚ÄúHear Yourself.‚Äù An additional virtual audience of 8,923 logged in from 86 countries, and Anjan TV also shared the celebration.  

The bestselling author read from his ‚ÄúHear Yourself‚Äù book, Chapter 3: ‚ÄúGround Yourself in Infinite Peace,‚Äù in Hindi, and answered questions from the Indian actress, Bhagayashree, who joined him on stage.

The author‚Äôs heartfelt words, based on decades of experience, emphasized the importance of  finding one‚Äôs own joy and peace within, no matter the situation, and how this is humankind‚Äôs  greatest possible achievement.

Surprising the audience at the end of the event, an adjudicator from Guinness World Records came on stage and announced that Prem Rawat had smashed the 2018 prior record for the largest audience attending a single author‚Äôs reading. Congratulations, Prem Rawat!

Watch the full Replay on TimelessToday app or website: https://www.timelesstoday.tv/230402-lucknow-video/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=des

v7ibs7qkfKM.Description:
In this powerful presentation in Barcelona, Spain, Prem Rawat connects with the audience in the hall and more than 8,000 individuals joining remotely, encouraging them to explore what true intelligence really means and how to recognize it in one‚Äôs lifetime.

"The story of your world revolves around your breath - being alive, being an aspirant of joy and being an aspirant of that beauty of life." Prem Rawat

Rather than settling for unproven promises about the afterlife, he invites us to discover "the heaven here," emphasizing that without inner peace, we create outer conflict. Through vivid analogies ‚Äì from helicopter pilots reading wind patterns to the subtle power hidden in our breath ‚Äì he illustrates how self-knowledge begins with awareness of our own breathing.

Learn more about how knowing yourself can transform everything you gather from life.

vjQ3cfdVycY.Name: Amaroo 2025 Opening Session
vjQ3cfdVycY.Description:
Amaroo 2025 Opening Session 1

More than 2,000 people gathered once again in Amaroo for this year‚Äôs 5-day retreat and focused on what the heart needs to soar. The opening session with Prem Rawat did just that: with his wit, wisdom and recently written and produced music tracks (shared only with Amaroo attendees at this time), he encouraged everyone to apply what they learn in Amaroo to their everyday life.

The peace educator and renowned storyteller shared the American Psychological Association's definition of 'joy' - a deep sense of well-being that differs from happiness, can persist through difficult times and often remains invisible to others.

wIncTVtC3KQ.Name: Hiroshima 75th Anniversary
wIncTVtC3KQ.Description:
Thursday, August 6, 2020 marked 75 years since that fateful day when 
the world‚Äôs first deployed atomic bomb was dropped on the people of 
Hiroshima, Japan. During this anniversary, the coronavirus pandemic 
impacted the ceremonies at Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park as people 
remembered the victims.

‚ÄúReal peace resides in the heart of every living human being. Each one of 
us needs to recognize it, to know it, to feel it.‚Äù ‚Äì‚ÄìPrem Rawat

On October 12, 2018 Prem Rawat spoke at the International Conference 
Centre in  Hiroshima and visited the memorial where he made this 
heartfelt observation: ‚ÄúPeople got up in the morning.... I don‚Äôt think 
anybody expected to die. 

What have we learned? What have we understood?

Every human being taking on that responsibility of knowing themselves 
and establishing peace for themselves is the only solution that has 
not been tried.‚Äù

Prem continues his lifelong commitment of reminding people of all ages 
that peace is achievable and should be our priority.

zTrrVzLMV7Y.Name: A Lifetime: Prem Rawat
zTrrVzLMV7Y.Description:
‚ÄúA Lifetime‚Äù episode begins with an extraordinary vignette that includes visuals of daily life accompanied by contemplative music and voices from people of many different ages and walks of life. This sets the stage for the excerpts of Prem Rawat‚Äôs addresses, in which he speaks about how human beings need to make the most of the limited time we have on the earth. The way to do that, he suggests, is to be simply human.

‚ÄúTo feel good because you‚Äôre in peace. To feel good because you feel good. If that is human nature, then only you can judge this: how far are you from that? And what was it that made you feel good? I bet you don‚Äôt even know. Just get up one day and you feel good! Then I submit humbly to you that that‚Äôs the way you should feel every single day."
